Advanced Standing Master of Social Work: Students with a bachelor's degree in social work may be eligible for an advanced standing Master of Social Work program. Advanced standing is a type of graduate program designed for students who have earned a bachelor's degree in social work from a university with a Council of Social Work Education-accredited program. Advanced standing M.S.W. programs typically require fewer credit hours than traditional M.S.W. programs.
